TextLibrary.Text: SABLE
Well, that was an interesting meeting. Cytech had me talk to an old vending machine to negotiate payment.
Well, that was an interesting meeting. Cytech had me talk to an old vending machine to negotiate payment.
Yeah, while I was waiting I attempted to buy some food from one of those only to have a fifteen minute philisophical discussion.
Tell me about it. While I waited I was accosted by an insurance android offering to sell insurance to protect against unwanted insurance salesmen.
In any event, I know the task we have set out for us -- and yes, the payment is a missing Psionic Weapon.
In any event, I know the task we have set out for us -- and yes, the payment is a missing Psionic Weapon.
Alright, what do we need to do?
Alright, what do we need to do?
Trident has aggressively set up a powerful double turret system on an outpost in Cytech space. The trouble is, this turret is protected by a powerful shielding system.
Trident has aggressively set up a powerful double turret system on an outpost in Cytech space. The trouble is, this turret is protected by a powerful shielding system.
How does our current Psionic setup factor into all of this?
How does our current Psionic setup factor into all of this?
There is a weapon, a Negaton Pulse Generator to be exact, that will neutralize this shielding, but it is only usable by the psionically augmented.
There is a weapon, a Negaton Pulse Generator to be exact, that will neutralize this shielding, but it is only usable by the psionically augmented.
Where do we get this weapon? Don't tell me we have to buy it. . .
Where do we get this weapon? Don't tell me we have to buy it. . .
Sadly, we have to purchase it, from Fornax Epsilon. The turret is orbiting Fornax Port. We will have to engage it normally after we fire the NPG.
Sadly, we have to purchase it, from Fornax Epsilon. The turret is orbiting Fornax Port. We will have to engage it normally after we fire the NPG.
Alright, first to Fornax Epsilon, then to Fornax Port.
Alright, first to Fornax Epsilon, then to Fornax Port.
